content.query:
CREATE VIEW dbo.nyc_taxi_trips1
AS SELECT 
    trip_distance,
    fare_amount,
    total_amount,
    trip_duration_minutes,
    VendorID,
    passenger_count,
    RatecodeID,
    store_and_fwd_flag,
    PULocationID,
    DOLocationID,
    payment_type,
    extra,
    mta_tax,
    tip_amount,
    tolls_amount,
    improvement_surcharge,
    congestion_surcharge,
    airport_fee,
    ingest_time ,
    [source],
    pickup_datetime ,
    dropoff_datetime ,
    passenger_bucket,
    ratecode_desc,
    payment_desc,
    taxi_type,
    [year],
    tip_percent,
    avg_speed_kmph,
    duration_bucket,
    net_revenue,
    anomaly_flag
FROM
OPENROWSET
(
	BULK 'gold/trip-data/',
	DATA_SOURCE = 'nycadlssource',
	FORMAT = 'parquet'
) AS nyctrips
